flowerlist.instructions: Large double. Good grower, heavy bloomer. Early to mid-season, acid loving plants. Plant in moist well drained soil with pH of 4.0-5.5.
flowerlist.name: Azalea

flowerlist.instructions: Beautiful large royal purple flowers adorn attractive satiny green leaves that turn orange\/red in cold weather. Grows to up to 18 feet, or prune annually to shorten.
flowerlist.name: Tibouchina Semidecandra

flowerlist.instructions: Blooms in summer, 20-35 inches high. Fertilize regularly for best results. Full sun, drought tolerant.
flowerlist.name: Hibiscus

flowerlist.instructions: Quick-growing, herbaceous, shrub reaching up to 30 inches in height, forming a rounded, dense bush.
flowerlist.name: Plectranthus
